channel.title: LostCause - Don't read too much, get a grip and CLICK!
channel.description:
[CENTER] [SIZE=6]- [URL=http://"http://lostcausersps.com/P/play.php"]Play Now[/URL] - [URL=http://"http://lostcausersps.com"]Community[/URL] - [URL=http://"http://lostcausersps.com/vote"]Vote[/URL] -[/SIZE]
[B]Features: [/B]Choosing between Spawn or Economy on Login Awesome balanced PvP Clanchat with coloring users (clan members) Voting for rewards Alot of skills working properly! Quick spawn tabs for Spawn Users Minigames Balanced economy Decent XP Rate And lots more!
Hello and welcome to the LostCause Advertisement, We got so much original content you could not believe it, and we got the best of all worlds do you enjoy Login, spawn and PK? Join us we have that! Do you enjoy decent speeded leveling with skilling and real economy? Join us we have that! Don't want to be bored out? join us and you will never be bored!
We are kind of a New/old school server which can be put somewhere in the middle of the RSPS era.
So yeah, do you enjoy killing noobs and just having a great time? Then what are you waiting for, join us today!
Upon First login you will be able to choose to play between Spawn or Economy all on the same server! [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/LostCause/Advertisement/starter.png[/img]
If you chose spawn you will be spawned at the area (watch picture below) and be able to spawn right away and own in the 3 different battle boxes! [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/LostCause/Advertisement/spawn.png[/img]
If you chose to play Economy you will be spawned in edgeville (watch picture below) and is given a decent starter to start your adventure and train/skill and earn your items the legit way! [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/LostCause/Advertisement/economy.png[/img]
As we are holding the home area at the edgeville town we also like to keep our shops there which will be easy to locate for everyone! [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/LostCause/Advertisement/ecoshops.png[/img]
And as a Economy player there's plenty of customised training areas and dungeons for you to explore! [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/LostCause/Advertisement/trainingdung.png[/img]
So what are you waiting for? Do you want to have an awesome time, join along right away and have that time of joy!
We need you, join us today!
[U][B]Sincerely, Lost[COLOR=#ffa500]C[/COLOR]ause Server[/B][/U][/CENTER]

item.title: LostCause - Don't read too much, get a grip and CLICK!
item.dc:creator: @LostCause LostCause
item.description:
@LostCause wrote:

[CENTER]
[SIZE=6]- Play Now - Community - Vote -[/SIZE]

Features:
Choosing between Spawn or Economy on Login
Awesome balanced PvP
Clanchat with coloring users (clan members)
Voting for rewards
Alot of skills working properly!
Quick spawn tabs for Spawn Users
Minigames
Balanced economy
Decent XP Rate
And lots more!

Hello and welcome to the LostCause Advertisement,
We got so much original content you could not believe it, and we got the best of all worlds
do you enjoy Login, spawn and PK? Join us we have that!
Do you enjoy decent speeded leveling with skilling and real economy? Join us we have that!
Don’t want to be bored out? join us and you will never be bored!

We are kind of a New/old school server which can be put somewhere in the middle of the RSPS era.

So yeah, do you enjoy killing noobs and just having a great time?
Then what are you waiting for, join us today!

Upon First login you will be able to choose to play between Spawn or Economy all on the same server!

If you chose spawn you will be spawned at the area (watch picture below) and be able to spawn right away and own in the 3 different battle boxes!

If you chose to play Economy you will be spawned in edgeville (watch picture below) and is given a decent starter to start your adventure and train/skill and earn your items the legit way!

As we are holding the home area at the edgeville town we also like to keep our shops there which will be easy to locate for everyone!

And as a Economy player there’s plenty of customised training areas and dungeons for you to explore!

So what are you waiting for?
Do you want to have an awesome time, join along right away and have that time of joy!

We need you, join us today!

Sincerely, Lost[COLOR=#ffa500]C[/COLOR]ause Server[/CENTER]
